title: Planet Earth II
Descriptions: David Attenborough returns with a new wildlife documentary that shows life in a variety of habitats.

title: Breaking Bad
Descriptions: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

title: Planet Earth
Descriptions: Emmy Award-winning, 11 episodes, five years in the making, the most expensive nature documentary series ever commissioned by the BBC, and the first to be filmed in high definition.

title: Band of Brothers
Descriptions: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

title: Chernobyl
Descriptions: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

title: The Wire
Descriptions: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

title: Blue Planet II
Descriptions: David Attenborough returns to the world's oceans in this sequel to the acclaimed documentary filming rare and unusual creatures of the deep, as well as documenting the problems our oceans face.

title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
Descriptions: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.
Acteurs: Michael Dante DiMartino,Bryan Konietzko,Dee Bradley Baker,Zach Tyler Eisen,Mae Whitman

title: Cosmos: A Spacetime Odyssey
Descriptions: An exploration of our discovery of the laws of nature and coordinates in space and time.

title: The Sopranos
Descriptions: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

title: Cosmos
Descriptions: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.
Acteurs: Ann Druyan,Carl Sagan,Steven Soter,Carl Sagan,Jaromír Hanzlík,Jonathan Fahn

title: Our Planet
Descriptions: Documentary series focusing on the breadth of the diversity of habitats around the world, from the remote Arctic wilderness and mysterious deep oceans to the vast landscapes of Africa and diverse jungles of South America.

title: Game of Thrones
Descriptions: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
Acteurs: David Benioff,D.B. Weiss,Emilia Clarke,Peter Dinklage,Kit Harington

title: Rick and Morty
Descriptions: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.
Acteurs: Dan Harmon,Justin Roiland,Justin Roiland,Chris Parnell,Spencer Grammer

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
Descriptions: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

title: Foyle's War
Descriptions: As WWII rages, DCS Foyle fights his own war on the home-front; investigating crime on the south coast of England. Later series, see the retired detective working as an MI5 agent in the aftermath of the war.

title: John Adams
Descriptions: The life of one of the USA's Founding Fathers, its second President, and his role in the nation's first 50 years.

title: X-Men: The Animated Series
Descriptions: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.
Acteurs: Mark Edward Edens,Sidney Iwanter,Eric Lewald,Cedric Smith,Cal Dodd,Lenore Zann

title: The Defiant Ones
Descriptions: "The Defiant Ones" examines the partnership between Jimmy Iovine and Dr. Dre - one the son of a Brooklyn longshoreman, the other straight out of Compton - and their leading roles in a chain of transformative events in contemporary culture.

title: Black Books
Descriptions: Bernard Black runs a book shop, though his customer service skills leave something to be desired. He hires Manny as an employee. Fran runs the shop next door. Between the three of them many adventures ensue.

title: Southland
Descriptions: The lives of Police Officers working for the Los Angeles Police Department.

title: Derry Girls
Descriptions: The personal exploits of a 16-year-old girl and her family and friends during the Troubles in the early 1990s.
Acteurs: Lisa McGee,Saoirse-Monica Jackson,Louisa Harland,Tara Lynne O'Neill

title: The Knick
Descriptions: A look at the professional and personal lives of the staff at New York's Knickerbocker Hospital during the early part of the twentieth century.
Acteurs: Jack Amiel,Michael Begler,André Holland,Clive Owen,Jeremy Bobb

title: The Great British Baking Show
Descriptions: Bakers attempt three challenges each week trying to impress the judges enough to go through to the next round and eventually are crowned Britain's best amateur baker.

title: Big Little Lies
Descriptions: The apparently-perfect lives of upper-class mothers of students at a prestigious elementary school unravel to the point of murder when a single mother moves to their quaint California beach town.
Acteurs: David E. Kelley,Reese Witherspoon,Nicole Kidman,Shailene Woodley

title: Your Lie in April
Descriptions: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.

title: Wentworth
Descriptions: The confronting look into the lives of the inmates and prison staff of Wentworth Correctional Centre as they navigate the ups and downs of their lives in the prison system.
Acteurs: Reg Watson,Lara Radulovich,Kate Atkinson,Katrina Milosevic,Robbie Magasiva

title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
Descriptions: Series of unrelated short stories covering elements of crime, horror, drama, and comedy about people of different backgrounds committing murders, suicides, thefts, and other sorts of crime caused by certain motivations, perceived or not.

title: My Brilliant Friend
Descriptions: A woman recounts the lifelong friendship and conflicts with a girl she met at primary school in Naples during the early 1950s.

title: The Night Of
Descriptions: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.
Acteurs: Richard Price,Steven Zaillian,Riz Ahmed,John Turturro,Bill Camp

title: Generation Kill
Descriptions: A Rolling Stone reporter, embedded with The 1st Recon Marines chronicles his experiences during the first wave of the American-led assault on Baghdad in 2003.

title: Chef's Table
Descriptions: Chef's Table goes inside the lives and kitchens of six of the world's most renowned international chefs. Each episode focuses on a single chef and their unique look at their lives, talents and passion from their piece of culinary heaven.

title: Regular Show
Descriptions: The daily surreal adventures of a blue jay and raccoon duo that attempt to deal with their mundane jobs as groundskeepers at the local park.

title: Mr Inbetween
Descriptions: Ray Shoesmith is a father, ex-husband, boyfriend, brother and best friend, tough roles to juggle in the modern age. Especially when you're also a criminal for hire.

title: The Expanse
Descriptions: In the 24th century, a group of humans untangle a vast plot which threatens the Solar System's fragile state of detente.
Acteurs: Daniel Abraham,Mark Fergus,Ty Franck,Steven Strait,Dominique Tipper,Wes Chatham

title: Community
Descriptions: A suspended lawyer is forced to enroll in a community college with an eccentric staff and student body.

title: Schitt's Creek
Descriptions: After being a victim of fraud, Johnny Rose and his family go from extremely wealthy to penniless overnight. The only asset left to them is a small, unsophisticated town: Schitt's Creek. They relocate there. Culture shock ensues.
Acteurs: Dan Levy,Eugene Levy,Eugene Levy,Catherine O'Hara,Dan Levy

title: Hannibal
Descriptions: Explores the early relationship between renowned psychiatrist Hannibal Lecter and a young FBI criminal profiler who is haunted by his ability to empathize with serial killers.

title: Umbre
Descriptions: Umbre follows Relu, an enforcer for a small-time mob boss, as he struggles to keep his family in the dark about his job. The secrets Relu keeps become increasingly oppressive and the lies begin to surface.

title: Cobra Kai
Descriptions: Decades after their 1984 All Valley Karate Tournament bout, a middle-aged Daniel LaRusso and Johnny Lawrence find themselves martial-arts rivals again.

title: Futurama
Descriptions: Philip J. Fry, a pizza delivery boy, is accidentally frozen in 1999 and thawed out on New Year's Eve 2999.
Acteurs: David X. Cohen,Matt Groening,Billy West,John DiMaggio,Katey Sagal

title: Rurouni Kenshin: Trust and Betrayal
Descriptions: In the era of Japan's Meiji Restoration, an assassin regains his humanity.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
Descriptions: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

title: Spartacus: Gods of the Arena
Descriptions: In the time before the arrival of Spartacus, the House of Batiatus faces many challenges from competitors, and within its own household.

title: Silicon Valley
Descriptions: Follows the struggle of Richard Hendricks, a Silicon Valley engineer trying to build his own company called Pied Piper.

title: From the Earth to the Moon
Descriptions: Dramatized portrayal of the Apollo manned space program.

title: Twin Peaks
Descriptions: Picks up 25 years after the inhabitants of a quaint northwestern town are stunned when their homecoming queen is murdered.
Acteurs: Mark Frost,David Lynch,Kyle MacLachlan,Sheryl Lee,Michael Horse

title: Trailer Park Boys
Descriptions: Three petty felons have a documentary made about their life in a trailer park.
Acteurs: Mike Clattenburg,John Paul Tremblay,Robb Wells,Mike Smith

title: Detectorists
Descriptions: The lives of two eccentric metal detectorists, who spend their days plodding along ploughed tracks and open fields, hoping to disturb the tedium by unearthing the fortune of a lifetime.

title: Endeavour
Descriptions: Set from 1965 to 1971, the show follows Endeavour Morse in his early years as a police constable. Working alongside his senior partner DI Fred Thursday, Morse engages in a number of investigations around Oxford.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
Descriptions: A teenage boy finds himself recruited as a member of an elite team of pilots by his father.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
Descriptions: When a failed alchemical ritual leaves brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric with severely damaged bodies, they begin searching for the one thing that can save them: the fabled philosopher's stone.

title: Doctor Who
Descriptions: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

title: Extraordinary Attorney Woo
Descriptions: About an autistic 27-year-old lawyer. Due to her high IQ of 164, impressive memory, and creative thought process, the brilliant Woo Young Woo graduated at the top of her class from a prestigious law school.

title: Sons of Anarchy
Descriptions: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

title: North & South
Descriptions: North and South is a four part adaptation of Elizabeth Gaskell's love story of Margaret Hale, a middle class southerner who is forced to move to the northern town of Milton.

title: Mob Psycho 100
Descriptions: A psychic middle school boy tries to live a normal life and keep his growing powers under control, even though he constantly gets into trouble.

title: Ezel
Descriptions: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Skam
Descriptions: The story of young teenagers and pupils on Hartvig Nissens upper secondary school in Oslo, and their troubles, scandals and everyday life. Each season is told from a different person's point of view.

title: Spartacus
Descriptions: The life of Spartacus, the gladiator who lead a rebellion against the Romans. From his time as an ally of the Romans, to his betrayal and becoming a gladiator, to the rebellion he leads and its ultimate outcome.

title: Samurai Jack
Descriptions: A samurai, sent through time, fights to return home and save the world.

title: Shameless
Descriptions: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.
Acteurs: Paul Abbott,John Wells,Emmy Rossum,William H. Macy,Ethan Cutkosky

title: Westworld
Descriptions: At the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, waits a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.
Acteurs: Lisa Joy,Jonathan Nolan,Evan Rachel Wood,Jeffrey Wright,Ed Harris

title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
Descriptions: Improvisational comedy competition show in which four members of the regular cast as comedians and often with guest appearances with other comedians and celebrities and members of the audience perform various comic games and sketches.

title: Through the Wormhole
Descriptions: Hosted by Morgan Freeman, Through the Wormhole will explore the deepest mysteries of existence - the questions that have puzzled mankind for eternity. What are we made of? What was there before the beginning? Are we really alone? Is there a creator? These questions have been pondered by the most exquisite minds of the human race. Now, science has evolved to the point ...

title: Letterkenny
Descriptions: Quick-witted, fast-paced snappy comedy about rural folk getting by in a small town.
Acteurs: Jared Keeso,Jacob Tierney,Jared Keeso,Nathan Dales,Michelle Mylett

title: The Office
Descriptions: The story of an office that faces closure when the company decides to downsize its branches. A documentary film crew follow staff and the manager David Brent as they continue their daily lives.

title: Mr. Robot
Descriptions: Elliot, a brilliant but highly unstable young cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global dominance when he and his shadowy allies try to take down the corrupt corporation he works for.

title: Louie
Descriptions: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: The IT Crowd
Descriptions: The comedic misadventures of Roy, Moss and their grifting supervisor Jen, a rag-tag team of IT support workers at a large corporation headed by a hotheaded yuppie.

title: Samurai Champloo
Descriptions: Fuu, a waitress who works in a teahouse, rescues two master swordsmen, Mugen and Jin, from their execution to help her find the "samurai who smells of sunflowers."

title: The Bureau

title: The Family Man

title: Long Way Round
Descriptions: This documentary series follows actors Ewan McGregor and Charley Boorman on a motorcycle trip around the world. The two friends will travel through such places as Siberia, Kazakhstan, Mongolia, and Alaska, before finally ending the journey in New York. The filming will be done by on board cameras and one ride along cameraman.
Acteurs: David Alexanian,Charley Boorman,Russ Malkin,Ewan McGregor,Charley Boorman,David Alexanian

title: El Chavo del Ocho
Acteurs: Roberto Gómez Bolaños,Ramón Valdés,Carlos Villagrán,Roberto Gómez Bolaños

title: Battlestar Galactica
Descriptions: Following the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Kobol by the Cylons, a rag-tag fugitive fleet of the last remnants of mankind flees the pursuing Cylons while simultaneously searching for their true home: Earth.

title: Homicide: Life on the Street
Descriptions: Life on the Street is an American police procedural television series chronicling the work of a fictional version of the Baltimore Police Department's Homicide Unit.

title: Spaced
Descriptions: Friends Tim and Daisy, 20-something North Londoners with uncertain futures, must pretend to be a couple to live in the only apartment they can afford.

title: The Venture Bros.
Descriptions: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Dragon Ball
Descriptions: Dragon Ball tells the tale of a young warrior by the name of Son Goku, a young peculiar boy with a tail who embarks on a quest to become stronger and learns of the Dragon Balls, when, once all 7 are gathered, grant any wish of choice.

title: Dragon Ball
Descriptions: Son Gokû, a fighter with a monkey tail, goes on a quest with an assortment of odd characters in search of the Dragon Balls, a set of crystals that can give its bearer anything they desire.

title: Justice League
Descriptions: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.
Acteurs: Bob Kane,William Moulton Marston,Joe Shuster,Carl Lumbly,Phil LaMarr,Michael Rosenbaum

title: Flight of the Conchords
Descriptions: Bret and Jemaine are Flight of the Conchords, a folk-rock band from New Zealand living in New York City in search of stardom.

title: Impractical Jokers
Descriptions: Q, Sal, Joe and Murr are real-life best friends who love challenging each other to the most outrageous dares and stunts ever caught on hidden camera.

title: The Offer

title: The Queen's Gambit

title: Formula 1: Drive to Survive
Descriptions: Docuseries following the FIA Formula One World Championship across multiple seasons.

title: Crash Landing on You

title: The Haunting of Hill House
Descriptions: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them from it.

title: The Newsroom
Descriptions: A newsroom undergoes some changes in its workings and morals as a new team is brought in, bringing unexpected results for its existing news anchor.
Acteurs: Aaron Sorkin,Jeff Daniels,Emily Mortimer,John Gallagher Jr.

title: The Eric Andre Show
Descriptions: Eric Andre tries to host a talk show in a bizarre environment, where he is sometimes the player of pranks and sometimes the victim.

title: Boardwalk Empire
Descriptions: An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era.

title: Justified
Descriptions: U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens is reassigned from Miami to his childhood home in the poor, rural coal mining towns of eastern Kentucky.

title: Making a Murderer
Descriptions: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Yes Minister
Descriptions: The Right Honorable James Hacker has landed the plum job of Cabinet Minister to the Department of Administration. At last he is in a position of power and can carry out some long-needed reforms, or so he thinks.

title: Poirot
Descriptions: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Mr. Bean
Descriptions: Bumbling, childlike Mr. Bean has trouble completing the simplest of day-to-day tasks, but his perseverance and resourcefulness frequently allow him to find ingenious ways around problems.
Acteurs: Rowan Atkinson,Richard Curtis,Rowan Atkinson,Robin Driscoll,Matilda Ziegler

title: Dopesick

title: Anne with an E
Descriptions: The adventures of a young orphan girl living in the early 19th century. Follow Anne as she learns to navigate her new life on Prince Edward Island, in this new take on L.M. Montgomery's classic novels.

title: The Rehearsal
Descriptions: Nathan Fielder gives people a chance to rehearse for their own lives in a world where nothing ever works out as expected.

title: QI
Descriptions: A comedy panel game in which being Quite Interesting is more important than being right. Sandi Toksvig is joined each week by four comedians to share anecdotes and trivia, and maybe answer some questions as well.

title: Haikyu!!
Descriptions: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player nicknamed "the small giant", Shoyo joins his school's volleyball club.

title: Critical Role
Descriptions: A live weekly show in which a band of professional voice actors improvise, role-play, and roll their way through an epic Dungeons and Dragons campaign.

title: Mindhunter
Descriptions: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Yeh Meri Family
Descriptions: Set in the summer of 1998 it is a story about conflicting emotions towards family members from the eyes of a twelve year old.

title: Gomorrah
Descriptions: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

title: Lonesome Dove
Descriptions: Two former Texas Rangers renew their spirit of adventure as they and several other residents of a small Texas town join a cattle drive to the Montana Territory.

title: Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War
Descriptions: The peace is suddenly broken when warning sirens blare through the Soul Society. Residents are disappearing without a trace and nobody knows who's behind it. Meanwhile, a darkness is approaching Ichigo and his friends in Karakura Town.

title: Young Justice
Descriptions: Teenage superheroes strive to prove themselves as members of the Justice League.
Acteurs: Greg Weisman,Brandon Vietti,Geoff Johns,Nolan North,Danica McKellar,Jesse McCartney

title: Adventure Time
Descriptions: A 12-year-old boy and his best friend, wise 28-year-old dog with magical powers, go on a series of surreal adventures with each other in a remote future.

title: Yellowstone
Descriptions: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.
Acteurs: John Linson,Taylor Sheridan,Kevin Costner,Luke Grimes,Kelly Reilly

title: Monster
Descriptions: A brilliant neurosurgeon finds his life in utter turmoil after getting involved with a psychopathic former patient.

title: Mystery Science Theater 3000
Descriptions: In the not-too-distant future Joel Robinson is held captive by Dr. Forrester and TV's Frank, forced to watch B-Grade movies on the Satellite of Love with the help of his robot friends: Cambot, Gypsy, Tom Servo and Crow T. Robot.

title: Archer
Descriptions: Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and relationships between secret agents and drones.
Acteurs: Adam Reed,H. Jon Benjamin,Judy Greer,Amber Nash

title: Heartstopper
Descriptions: Teens Charlie and Nick discover their unlikely friendship might be something more as they navigate school and young love in this coming-of-age series.

title: It's a Sin
Descriptions: A chronicle of four friends during a decade in which everything changed, including the rise of AIDS.
Acteurs: Russell T. Davies,Olly Alexander,Nathaniel Curtis,Shaun Dooley

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Descriptions: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

title: Daredevil
Descriptions: A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.
Acteurs: Drew Goddard,Charlie Cox,Vincent D'Onofrio,Deborah Ann Woll

title: The Bridge
Descriptions: When a body is found on the bridge between Denmark and Sweden, right on the border, Danish inspector Martin Rohde and Swedish Saga Norén have to share jurisdiction and work together to find the killer.
Acteurs: Måns Mårlind,Hans Rosenfeldt,Björn Stein,Sofia Helin,Rafael Pettersson,Sarah Boberg

title: Code Geass
Descriptions: After being given a mysterious power to control others, an outcast prince becomes the masked leader of the rebellion against an all-powerful empire.

title: Primal
Descriptions: A caveman and a dinosaur bond over shared tragedy and work together to survive in a perilous prehistoric world.

title: Atlanta
Descriptions: Earn and his cousin Alfred, based in Atlanta, try to make their way in the world through the rap scene. Along the way they come face-to-face with social and economic issues touching on race, relationships, poverty, status, and parenthood.
Acteurs: Donald Glover,Donald Glover,Brian Tyree Henry,LaKeith Stanfield

title: Naruto: Shippuden
Descriptions: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.

title: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst
Descriptions: Filmmaker Andrew Jarecki examines the complicated life of reclusive real estate icon Robert Durst, the key suspect in a series of unsolved crimes.

title: This Is Us
Descriptions: A heartwarming and emotional story about a unique set of triplets, their struggles and their wonderful parents.
Acteurs: Dan Fogelman,Milo Ventimiglia,Mandy Moore,Sterling K. Brown

title: Dexter
Descriptions: He's smart. He's lovable. He's Dexter Morgan, America's favorite serial killer, who spends his days solving crimes and nights committing them. Golden Globe winner Michael C. Hall stars in the hit SHOWTIME Original Series.
Acteurs: James Manos Jr.,Michael C. Hall,Jennifer Carpenter,David Zayas

title: The X-Files
Descriptions: Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.

title: Parks and Recreation
Descriptions: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.
Acteurs: Greg Daniels,Michael Schur,Amy Poehler,Jim O'Heir,Nick Offerman

title: Deadwood
Descriptions: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

title: Father Ted
Descriptions: Three misfit priests and their housekeeper live on Craggy Island, not the peaceful and quiet part of Ireland that it seems to be.
Follows the Dutton family as they embark on a journey west.

title: Line of Duty
Descriptions: Drama series following the investigations of AC-12, a controversial police anti-corruption unit.

title: Justice League Unlimited
Descriptions: A continuation of the Justice League animated series finds the original members of the team joined in their battle against crime and evil by dozens of other heroes from the DC comics universe.

title: The Thick of It
Descriptions: The Minister for Social Affairs is continually harassed by Number 10's policy enforcer and dependent on his not-so-reliable team of civil servants.

title: The Crown
Descriptions: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.

title: The Grand Tour
Descriptions: Follow Jeremy, Richard and James, as they embark on an adventure across the globe, driving new and exciting automobiles from manufacturers all over the world.

title: Berserk
Descriptions: Guts is a skilled swordsman who joins forces with a mercenary group named 'The Band of the Hawk', lead by the charismatic Griffith, and fights with them as they battle their way into the royal court.

title: Top Gear
Descriptions: The hosts talk about everything car-related. From new cars to how they're fueled, this show has it all.

title: Friday Night Lights
Descriptions: A drama that follows the lives of the Dillon Panthers, one of the nation's best high school football teams, and their head coach Eric Taylor.

title: House of Cards
Descriptions: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
Descriptions: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
Descriptions: Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's 5-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers set off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on its own mission to go where no one has gone before.

title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
Descriptions: After her husband leaves her, young mother of two Miriam "Midge" Maisel discovers that she has a talent for stand-up comedy. Could this be her calling?

title: Peep Show
Descriptions: Mark and Jez are a couple of twenty-something roommates who have nothing in common - except for the fact that their lives are anything but normal. Mayhem ensues as the pair strive to cope with day-to-day life.

title: Severance
Descriptions: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.

title: Vinland Saga
Descriptions: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

title: Mad Men
Descriptions: A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.

title: Panchayat
Descriptions: A comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a Panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh.

title: Sarabhai V/S Sarabhai
Descriptions: The show revolves around the lives of the members of an Uber Wealthy - High Society Gujarati family of Cuffe Parade - South Bombay, whose daughter-in-law is from a middle class Delhi background.

title: Invincible
Descriptions: An adult animated series based on the Skybound/Image comic about a teenager whose father is the most powerful superhero on the planet.
Acteurs: Robert Kirkman,Ryan Ottley,Cory Walker,Steven Yeun,J.K. Simmons,Sandra Oh

title: Downton Abbey
Descriptions: A chronicle of the lives of the British aristocratic Crawley family and their servants in the early twentieth century.

title: Stranger Things
Descriptions: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

title: Battlestar Galactica
Descriptions: When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fabled 13th colony, Earth.
Acteurs: Glen A. Larson,Ronald D. Moore,Edward James Olmos,Mary McDonnell,Jamie Bamber

title: House
Descriptions: An antisocial maverick doctor who specializes in diagnostic medicine does whatever it takes to solve puzzling cases that come his way using his crack team of doctors and his wits.
Acteurs: David Shore,Hugh Laurie,Omar Epps,Robert Sean Leonard

title: The Shield
Descriptions: Drama series following the lives and cases of dirty cop Vic Mackey and the LAPD unit under his command.

title: Fleabag
Descriptions: A comedy series adapted from the award-winning play about a young woman trying to cope with life in London whilst coming to terms with a recent tragedy.

title: The Simpsons
Descriptions: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.
Acteurs: James L. Brooks,Matt Groening,Sam Simon,Dan Castellaneta,Nancy Cartwright,Harry Shearer

title: One Punch Man
Descriptions: The story of Saitama, a hero that does it just for fun & can defeat his enemies with a single punch.

title: The Boys
Descriptions: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

title: Arrested Development
Descriptions: Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.
Acteurs: Mitchell Hurwitz,Jason Bateman,Michael Cera,Portia de Rossi

title: Steins;Gate
Descriptions: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: The Mandalorian
Descriptions: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

title: Dark
Descriptions: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.
Acteurs: Baran bo Odar,Jantje Friese,Louis Hofmann,Karoline Eichhorn,Lisa Vicari

title: Kota Factory
Descriptions: Dedicated to Shrimati SL Loney ji, Shri Irodov ji and Maanniya HC Verma ji, 'Kota Factory' is TVF's latest original. India's first 'Black and White' show highlights the problems present day IIT-JEE aspirants face in their day-to-day lives.

title: Over the Garden Wall
Descriptions: Two brothers find themselves lost in a mysterious land and try to find their way home.
Acteurs: Katie Krentz,Patrick McHale,Elijah Wood,Collin Dean,Melanie Lynskey

title: Oz
Descriptions: A series chronicling the daily activities of an unusual prison facility and its criminal inhabitants.

title: Ted Lasso
Descriptions: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.
Acteurs: Brendan Hunt,Joe Kelly,Bill Lawrence,Jason Sudeikis,Brett Goldstein,Brendan Hunt

title: Peaky Blinders
Descriptions: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.

title: Six Feet Under
Descriptions: A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.
Acteurs: Alan Ball,Peter Krause,Michael C. Hall,Frances Conroy

title: Rome
Descriptions: A down-to-earth account of the lives of both illustrious and ordinary Romans set in the last days of the Roman Republic.
Acteurs: Bruno Heller,William J. MacDonald,John Milius,Kevin McKidd,Ray Stevenson,Polly Walker

title: South Park
Descriptions: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.
Acteurs: Trey Parker,Matt Stone,Brian Graden,Trey Parker,Matt Stone,Isaac Hayes

title: One Piece
Descriptions: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

title: I, Claudius
Descriptions: The personal and governmental affairs of the Julio-Claudian dynasty at the beginning of the Roman Empire, as recalled by one of its rulers.

title: Dragon Ball Z
Descriptions: The adventures of Earth's martial arts defender, Son Goku, continue with a new family and the revelation of his alien origins. Now Goku and his allies must defend the planet from an onslaught of new extraterrestrial enemies.

title: Dragon Ball Z
Descriptions: With the help of the powerful Dragonballs, a team of fighters led by the saiyan warrior Goku defend the planet earth from extraterrestrial enemies.

title: Chappelle's Show
Descriptions: Comedian Dave Chappelle hosts this sketch-comedy show that parodies many of the nuances of race and culture.
Acteurs: Neal Brennan,Dave Chappelle,Dave Chappelle,Donnell Rawlings,Rudy Rush

title: Succession
Descriptions: The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.

title: BoJack Horseman
Descriptions: BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit television show "Horsin' Around" in the '80s and '90s, but now he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

title: Narcos
Descriptions: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.
Acteurs: Carlo Bernard,Chris Brancato,Doug Miro,Pedro Pascal,Wagner Moura,Boyd Holbrook

title: Black Mirror
Descriptions: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

title: Twin Peaks
Descriptions: An idiosyncratic FBI agent investigates the murder of a young woman in the even more idiosyncratic town of Twin Peaks.
Acteurs: Mark Frost,David Lynch,Kyle MacLachlan,Michael Ontkean,Mädchen Amick

title: Freaks and Geeks
Descriptions: A high school mathlete starts hanging out with a group of burnouts while her younger brother navigates his freshman year.
Acteurs: Paul Feig,Linda Cardellini,John Francis Daley,James Franco

title: Fawlty Towers
Descriptions: Hotel owner Basil Fawlty's incompetence, short fuse, and arrogance form a combination that ensures accidents and trouble are never far away.

title: Pride and Prejudice
Descriptions: While the arrival of wealthy gentlemen sends her marriage-minded mother into a frenzy, willful and opinionated Elizabeth Bennet matches wits with haughty Mr. Darcy.

title: The West Wing
Descriptions: Inside the lives of staffers in the West Wing of the White House.

title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
Descriptions: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Taskmaster
Descriptions: Five comedians are set tasks challenging their creativity and wit. The tasks are supervised by Alex Horne but the Taskmaster, Greg Davies, always has the final word.

title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
Descriptions: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.
Acteurs: Rob McElhenney,Glenn Howerton,Charlie Day,Rob McElhenney,Kaitlin Olson

title: Monty Python's Flying Circus
Descriptions: The original surreal sketch comedy showcase for the Monty Python troupe.
Acteurs: Graham Chapman,Eric Idle,Terry Jones,Graham Chapman,John Cleese,Terry Gilliam

title: Apocalypse: The Second World War
Descriptions: This six-part series traces the Second World War, from the rise of the Nazis to the surrender of the Japanese, with detailed portraits of key figures.

title: TVF Pitchers
Descriptions: A story of trials and tribulations of four young entrepreneurs who quit their day jobs in order to pursue their start up venture.

title: Friends
Descriptions: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.
Acteurs: David Crane,Marta Kauffman,Jennifer Aniston,Courteney Cox,Lisa Kudrow

title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
Descriptions: Former Daily Show host and correspondent John Oliver brings his persona to this weekly news satire program.

title: When They See Us
Descriptions: Five teens from Harlem become trapped in a nightmare when they're falsely accused of a brutal attack in Central Park. Based on the true story.

title: Gravity Falls
Descriptions: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.

title: Nathan for You
Descriptions: Nathan Fielder uses his business degree and life experiences to help real small businesses turn a profit. But because of his unorthodox approach, Nathan's genuine efforts to do good often draw real people into an experience far beyond what they signed up for.
Acteurs: Nathan Fielder,Michael Koman,Nathan Fielder,Anthony Filosa,Salomon Flores

title: Clarkson's Farm
Descriptions: Follow Jeremy Clarkson as he attempts to run a farm in the countryside.

title: Cowboy Bebop
Descriptions: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.

title: Fargo
Descriptions: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. Yet all of these tales mysteriously lead back one way or another to Fargo, North Dakota.
Acteurs: Noah Hawley,Billy Bob Thornton,Martin Freeman,Allison Tolman

title: Persona
Descriptions: A man diagnosed with Alzheimer's decides to punish criminals.

title: Dekalog
Descriptions: Ten television drama films, each one based on one of the Ten Commandments.

title: The Beatles: Get Back
Descriptions: Documentary about the music group The Beatles featuring in-studio footage that was shot in early 1969 for the 1970 feature film 'Let It Be.'

title: Seinfeld
Descriptions: The continuing misadventures of neurotic New York City stand-up comedian Jerry Seinfeld and his equally neurotic New York City friends.
Acteurs: Larry David,Jerry Seinfeld,Jerry Seinfeld,Julia Louis-Dreyfus,Michael Richards

title: Better Call Saul
Descriptions: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the years leading up to his fateful run-in with Walter White and Jesse Pinkman.
Acteurs: Vince Gilligan,Peter Gould,Bob Odenkirk,Rhea Seehorn,Jonathan Banks

title: True Detective
Descriptions: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: The Civil War
Descriptions: A comprehensive survey of the American Civil War.

title: Only Fools and Horses
Descriptions: Comedy that follows two brothers from London's rough Peckham estate as they wheel and deal through a number of dodgy deals and search for the big score that'll make them millionaires.
Acteurs: John Sullivan,David Jason,Nicholas Lyndhurst,Roger Lloyd Pack

title: Hunter x Hunter
Descriptions: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks out his father, who left him when he was younger.

title: Death Note
Descriptions: An intelligent high school student goes on a secret crusade to eliminate criminals from the world after discovering a notebook capable of killing anyone whose name is written into it.

title: Frozen Planet
Descriptions: Focuses on life and the environment in both the Arctic and Antarctic.

title: Human Planet
Descriptions: A cinematic experience bringing you the most amazing human stories in the world. Humans and wildlife surviving in the most extreme environments on Earth

title: Firefly
Descriptions: Five hundred years in the future, a renegade crew aboard a small spacecraft tries to survive as they travel the unknown parts of the galaxy and evade warring factions as well as authority agents out to get them.

title: The Office
Descriptions: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.
Acteurs: Greg Daniels,Ricky Gervais,Stephen Merchant,Steve Carell,Jenna Fischer,John Krasinski

title: Attack on Titan
Descriptions: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

title: The Blue Planet
Descriptions: Mammoth series, five years in the making, taking a look at the rich tapestry of life in the world's oceans.

title: Arcane
Descriptions: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

title: Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story
Descriptions: Set in 1980s and '90s Bombay, it follows the life of Harshad Mehta, a stockbroker who took the stock market to dizzying heights and his catastrophic downfall.

title: Batman: The Animated Series
Descriptions: The Dark Knight battles crime in Gotham City with occasional help from Robin and Batgirl.
Acteurs: Bob Kane,Eric Radomski,Bruce Timm,Kevin Conroy,Loren Lester,Efrem Zimbalist Jr.

title: Bluey
Descriptions: The slice-of-life adventures of an Australian Blue Heeler Cattle Dog puppy as she has fun with her family and friends in everyday situations.
Acteurs: Joe Brumm,David McCormack,Melanie Zanetti,Ninthe van Schie

title: The Vietnam War
Descriptions: A comprehensive history of the United States' involvement in the bitterly divisive armed conflict in Southeast Asia.

title: The Twilight Zone
Descriptions: Ordinary people find themselves in extraordinarily astounding situations, which they each try to solve in a remarkable manner.

title: Sherlock
Descriptions: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st-century London.
Acteurs: Mark Gatiss,Steven Moffat,Benedict Cumberbatch,Martin Freeman,Una Stubbs

title: Life
Descriptions: David Attenborough's legendary BBC crew explains and shows wildlife all over planet earth. From giving an overview of the challenges facing life to hunting the deep sea and various major evolutionary groups of creatures.

title: The Last Dance
Descriptions: Charting the rise of the 1990s Chicago Bulls, led by Michael Jordan, one of the most notable dynasties in sports history.
